title: Which is the top 10 smartphone? - Quora

response.answer_text: For me it will be S7 EdgeiPhone 7/ 7 PlusGoogle Pixel/ Pixel XLHuawei Mate 9LG V20OnePlus 3/ 3THonor 8Moto G4 PlusRedmi Note 4Lenovo K6 PowerThis is my list of top smartphones for 2016, If you feel something else let me know :)

according to 2016 1.SAMSUNG GALAXY S7/S7 EDGE 2. APPLE IPHONE 7 PLUS/7 3. HTC 10 4. SAMSUNG GALAXY NOTE 5 5. LG V10 6. LG G5 7. GOOGLE'S HUAWEI NEXUS 6P 8. NEXTBIT ROBIN 9. BLACKBERRY PRIV 10. ONE PLUS 3T
